    GenericModel
    A super class for JPA entities bran: lots of the method used to return , I changed them to , forgot why....
    GenericModel.JPAQuery
    A JPAQuery
    HibernateInterceptor  
    JPA
    JPA Support This class holds reference to all JPA configurations.
    JPABase
    A super class for JPA entities
    JPAConfig
    JPA Support for a specific JPA/DB configuration dbConfigName corresponds to properties-names in application.conf.
    JPAConfigurationExtension
    Implementors of this class can extend the Ejb3Configuration before it is used to build the EntityManagerFactory
    JPAContext
    JPA Support
    JPAEnhancer
    Enhance JPABase entities classes bran: I changed some of the returned type of the added method from JPABase to GenericModel, to match the change I have made to the GenericModel.
    JPAModelLoader  
    JPAPlugin
    JPA Plugin
    JPASupport 已过时
    JPASupport.JPAQuery 已过时

    bran: I changed some of the returned type of the added method from JPABase to GenericModel, to match the change I have made to the GenericModel.
    Model
    Base class for JPA model objects Automatically provide a @Id Long id field
    MySQLDialect
    InnoDB, UTF-8 dialect for Mysql

  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    NoTransaction
    Annotation to be used on methods telling JPA that it should not create a Transaction at all.
